headline: GoDaddy Inc. Announces Refinancing of Tranche B-6 Loans
summary: GoDaddy Inc. (NYSE: GDDY) announced Go Daddy Operating Company, LLC and GD Finance Co, LLC (together with Go Daddy Operating Company, LLC, the "Borrowers") allocated a $1,463 million tranche (the "Replacement Term Loans") of term loans maturing in 2029, the proceeds of which will be used to refinance all outstanding Tranche B-6 Term Loans under the Second Amended and Restated Credit Agreement, dated as of February 15, 2017 (as amended, restated, supplemented or otherwise modified, refinanced or

headline: GoDaddy price target raised to $224 from $175 at JPMorgan
summary: JPMorgan raised the firm’s price target on GoDaddy (GDDY) to $224 from $175 and keeps an Overweight rating on the shares following the investor day. While the free version of Airo has been an catalyst of cross-sell, Airo Plus can be discretely monetized, the analyst tells investors in a research note. The firm says the even provides greater confidence in the long-term trajectory of GoDaddy’s Application and Commerce segment, which is also the higher-margin side of the business. Published first o
